thread.title: Jane Penney

author: Jane Penney
title: Jane Penney
text:
I thought I would give this a try as my spaniel was getting older and having had a knee operation a little slower, The first bag arrived and when I opened it and offered it to my dog he was only to happy to take from my hand.
The ordering could not have been simpler and I don't have to worry about re-ordering as it arrives on the door step with a text to say it's on its way
The dog has lost weight on this food and appears to have more energy and all round a happier springer spaniel
